- API stands for Application Programming Interface
- When statisticians talk about APIs, we mean data APIs. 
- All websites using data have APIs. 
- [IFTTT](https://ifttt.com/) connects apps together

- Lots of APIs
 - [Government data](https://www.data.gov/developers/apis) (18F)
 - [rOpenSci](http://ropensci.org/packages/#data_access)
 - If you see a data API, there is probably an R package to access it
 - If not, you can make the package
